Description: The following statement contains a magic number: data = new List<Int32> { 0' 1' 2 };

The following statement contains a magic number: data.ForEachWithLast((i' last) =>                  {                      if (last)                          Assert.AreEqual(2' i);                  });

The following statement contains a magic number: data.ForEachWithLast((i' last) =>                  {                      if (!last)                          Assert.AreNotEqual(2' i);                  });
